name: Aboleth

actions.description: Deals an extra die of damage if it hits the same target with both claws.

actions.description: Immune to damage from cold or non-magical sources. Healed by fire.

actions.name: Poison Breath
actions.description: All within near, DC 15 CON or 8d6 damage.

name: Golem, Stone
description: A wide-limbed, lumbering statue that shakes the ground.

actions.name: Golem
actions.description: Immune to damage from fire, cold, electricity, or non-magical sources.

actions.name: Slow
actions.description: Far range, one target. DC 15 CON or speed halved 1d4 rds.

name: Gorgon
description: A snorting bull made entirely of iron plating. A cloud of green fog billows from its nostrils.
attack: 2 gore +6 (2d8) or 1 charge or 1 petrifying breath

actions.name: Charge
actions.description: Move up to double near in straight line and make 1 gore attack. If hit, x3 damage.

actions.name: Petrifying Breath
actions.description: Fills a near-sized cube extending from gorgon. DC 15 CON or petrified (gorgons immune).

name: Gorilla
description: Mighty, jungle-dwelling apes.

name: Gray Ooze
description: Slick puddles the color of stone.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Immune to damage from acid, cold, or fire.

actions.name: Corrosive
actions.description: Nonmagical metal that touches the ooze dissolves on a d6 roll of 1-3.

name: Greater Elemental, Air
description: A howling tornado of wind.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources.

actions.name: Whirlwind
actions.description: All within close DC 15 DEX or flung 2d20 feet in random direction.

name: Greater Elemental, Earth
description: A thundering pillar of earth.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources.

actions.name: Avalanche
actions.description: All within close DC 15 STR or entombed for 1d4 rounds under mounds of earth.

name: Greater Elemental, Fire
description: A roaring column of flames.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources. Fire immune.

actions.name: Inferno
actions.description: All within near DC 15 DEX or 3d8 damage.

name: Greater Elemental, Water
description: A crashing vortex of water.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources.

actions.name: Whirlpool
actions.description: All within close DC 15 STR or immobilized inside water elemental (treat as underwater). DC 15 STR on turn to escape.

name: Grick
description: A huge worm with four suckered tentacles and a snapping beak.

actions.name: Camouflage
actions.description: Hard to see in cave terrain or rocks.

actions.name: Grab
actions.description: Target is immobilized. DC 15 Strength check on turn to break free.

name: Griffon
description: Winged hunters with the head of an eagle and body of a lion. Their favored food is horses.

name: Grimlow
description: A tall, oval-shaped mammal. A giant, half-moon maw hides on its belly beneath its gray fur.

actions.name: Grab
actions.description: One target in near DC 15 STR or wrapped in grimlow's tongue and pulled into its mouth. Bite attacks automatically hit the target. Can only grab 1 target at a time. DC 15 STR on turn to break free.

name: Guard
description: A sentry equipped with sturdy weapons and armor.

name: Hag, Night
description: A purple-skinned, stooped woman with stringy, white hair and a mouth full of iron teeth.

actions.name: Blind
actions.description: One target within near DC 15 CHA or blinded for 1d4 days.

actions.name: Shapechange
actions.description: Instantly change to look like any other humanoid.

name: Hag, Sea
description: A green, sunken-faced woman. Seaweed hair and oozing flesh.

actions.name: Shapechange
actions.description: Instantly change to look like any other humanoid.

actions.name: Terrify
actions.description: A creature who first sees her true form DC 15 CHA or DISADV on attacks 1d4 rounds.

name: Hag, Weald
description: Eyes dark as moonless nights, skin made of rotting wood, hair of tangled roots and vines.

actions.name: Drink Pain
actions.description: Near range. DC 12 CHA to deal 2d4 damage to a creature; regain that many HP.

actions.name: Shapechange
actions.description: Instantly change to look like any other humanoid.

name: Harpy
description: Horrific, winged women with vulture-like lower bodies. They keen a hypnotic song.

actions.name: Song
actions.description: Enemies who can hear within double near DC 12 CHA or dazed and drawn to harpy for 1d4 rounds. Immune for 1 day if passed check.

name: Hell Hound
description: Black wolfhounds with red eyes and jaws dripping with flames.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Fire immune.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: Fills a near-sized cube extending from hell hound. DC 15 DEX or 3d8 damage.

name: Hippogriff
description: Fierce, winged creatures with the lower body of a horse and upper body of a giant eagle.

name: Hippopotamus
description: Ornery river-beasts as large as cows with round, purple bodies and bulbous snouts.

actions.name: Stumpy
actions.description: ADV on STR checks to grab or drag other creatures.

name: Hobgoblin
description: A sturdy, tall goblin with russet skin. Militant and strategic.

actions.name: Phalanx
actions.description: +1 to attacks and AC when in close range of an allied hobgoblin.

name: Horse
description: Powerful, swift herd animals that roam open plains.

name: Hydra
description: A towering, amphibious reptile with a bouquet of snake heads writhing on long necks.

actions.name: Heads
actions.description: Choose how many heads the hydra has. Each is LV 2, AC 15, HP 11, and can make 1 bite attack. A killed head sprouts into two new heads at the start of the hydra's turn unless cauterized beforehand. The hydra's LV is all the heads combined.

name: Invisible Stalker
description: Intelligent creatures made of flowing air. Often bound to the bidding of evil sorcerers for their peerless tracking ability.

actions.name: Bound
actions.description: A secret, mundane contingency (such as the touch of a feather) ends the invisible stalker's magical servitude.

actions.name: Invisible
actions.description: Naturally invisible.

actions.name: Tracking
actions.description: Can always sense the direction of its chosen quarry.

name: Jellyfish
description: Hand-sized, purple sea jellies with stinging tentacles.

actions.name: Toxin
actions.description: DC 9 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Knight
description: A warrior in shining plate mail and the surcoat of a knightly order.

actions.name: Oath
actions.description: 3/day, ADV on a roll made in service of knight's order.

name: Kobold
description: Puny, scaled coyote-lizards that dwell underground.

actions.name: Dodge
actions.description: 1/day, an attack that would hit misses instead.

name: Kobold, Sorcerer
description: A scaly dog-lizard painted with colorful stripes and rattling a hefty leg bone strung with beads and feathers.

actions.name: Dodge
actions.description: 1/day, an attack that would hit misses instead.

actions.name: Scorpion Sting (CHA Spell)
actions.description: DC 11. Near range, one target. 1d6 damage and target has DISADV on next attack roll or check.

actions.name: Spider Swarm (CHA Spell)
actions.description: DC 12. A spider swarm appears within near. Stays 1d4 rounds.

name: Kraken
description: Primordial, tentacled leviathans the size of war galleons. They live in the lightless depths of the deep ocean.
attack: 4 tentacle (near) +9 (2d12) or 1 storm or 1d4 lightning bolt

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Electricity immune.

actions.name: Crush
actions.description: Tentacle attacks deal double damage against objects.

actions.name: Lightning Bolt
actions.description: Straight line (5' wide) extending far from kraken. DC 15 DEX or 6d6 damage.

actions.name: Storm
actions.description: Seas become violently turbulent in 1 mile radius around kraken. Lasts 2d4 rounds.

name: Leech, Giant
description: A glossy black, blood-drinking slug as large as a cat.

actions.name: Attach
actions.description: Attach to target; bite auto-hits next round. DC 12 STR on turn to tear off.

name: Leprechaun
description: Impish fey who favor green garb and love fooling tall folk with promises of gold.

actions.name: Alert
actions.description: Cannot be surprised.

actions.name: Slippery
actions.description: Hostile spells targeting the leprechaun are DC 15 to cast.

actions.name: Fool's Gold (CHA Spell)
actions.description: DC 12. Close. One small object or small group of similar objects. Turn objects into silver or gold pieces. Lasts 1 day.

actions.name: Illusion (CHA Spell)
actions.description: DC 11. Create a convincing visual and/or auditory illusion within near. Lasts until dismissed.

actions.name: Invisibility (CHA Spell)
actions.description: DC 12. Self. Become invisible for 2d4 rounds.

name: Lesser Elemental, Air
description: A howling tornado of wind.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources.

actions.name: Whirlwind
actions.description: All within close DC 15 DEX or flung 2d20 feet in random direction.

name: Lesser Elemental, Earth
description: A thundering pillar of earth.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources.

actions.name: Avalanche
actions.description: All within close DC 15 STR or entombed for 1d4 rounds under mounds of earth.

name: Lesser Elemental, Fire
description: A roaring column of flames.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources. Fire immune.

actions.name: Inferno
actions.description: All within near DC 15 DEX or 3d8 damage.

name: Lesser Elemental, Water
description: A crashing vortex of water.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources.

actions.name: Whirlpool
actions.description: All within close DC 15 STR or immobilized inside water elemental (treat as underwater). DC 15 STR on turn to escape.

name: Lich
description: A wizard who has completed a necromantic ritual to become a mighty, undead sorcerer. Its withered body is draped in moldering, silk robes, and red marshlights burn in its eyes.

actions.name: Supreme Undead
actions.description: Immune to morale checks. Only damaged by magical sources.

actions.name: Phylactery
actions.description: Can't be killed while spirit vessel (an object) is intact.

actions.name: Paralysis
actions.description: DC 15 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Flight (INT Spell)
actions.description: Self. DC 13. Fly double near for 5 rounds.

actions.name: Null (INT Spell)
actions.description: Self. DC 14. Hostile spells targeting lich are DC 18 to cast. Lasts 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Shadow Leap (INT Spell)
actions.description: Self. DC 14. Teleport up to 100 miles.

actions.name: Sigil of Doom (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 15. One target of LV 9 or less within near DC 15 CON or go to 0 HP.

actions.name: Wither (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 14. 4d8 damage to enemies within a near-sized cube centered on lich.

name: Lion
description: Tawny great cats that hunt in open plains. Males have manes.

name: Lizardfolk
description: Crocodilian humanoids with scaly faces, claws, and tails. They dwell in swamps and rivers.

name: Mage
description: Trained wizards who are often members of a sorcerous order.

actions.name: Arcane Armor (INT Spell)
actions.description: Self. DC 12. AC 16 for 2d4 rounds.

actions.name: Blast (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 12. Far, one target. 2d6 damage.

actions.name: Cancel (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 13. End one spell affecting a target within near.

actions.name: Levitate (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 12. Close. Focus. Hover near for duration, vertical movement only.

actions.name: Snare (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 13. Focus. One humanoid target within near paralyzed for duration.

name: Mammoth
description: Massive, shaggy elephants with tusks that reach the ground.

actions.name: Thick Fur
actions.description: Cold immune.

actions.name: Charge
actions.description: Move up to double near in straight line and make 1 tusks attack. If hit, x3 damage.

name: Manta Ray, Giant
description: Swooping manta rays as large as longboats. Gentle and intelligent enough to be trained.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 15 CON or drop to 0 hit points in 1d4 rounds.

name: Manticore
description: Human-faced lions with bat wings and cruelly spiked tails. They speak halting Thanian and love devouring human flesh.

actions.name: Spikes
actions.description: Manticores have 4d6 tail spikes. They regrow each day.

name: Mastiff
description: Muscled guard dogs with fierce loyalty to their pack or owners.

name: Medusa
description: Immortal women with coiling snakes for hair and scaled skin.

actions.name: Godborn
actions.description: Hostile spells targeting the medusa are DC 15 to cast.

actions.name: Petrify
actions.description: Any creature (including medusa) who looks directly at medusa, DC 15 CON or petrified.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 15 CON or go to 0 HP.

name: Merfolk
description: Ocean dwellers with human upper bodies and long fish tails.

name: Mimic
description: Beasts that look like objects.

actions.name: Stick
actions.description: DC 15 STR or adhere to target; auto-hit with bite. DC 15 STR on turn to remove.

name: Minotaur
description: Ferocious bull-men with hooves and curved horns. They live in mazelike tunnels.

actions.name: Charge
actions.description: In place of attacks, move up to double near in a straight line and make 1 horn attack. If hit, x2 damage.

name: Moose
description: A towering, brown-haired grazer with weighty, flat antlers.

name: Mordanticus The Flayed
description: A skinless mummy-lich wearing a crown set with nine bright gems. Once the head of the ancient, wizardly order of Gehemna, Mordanticus now lives in secret within the sanctum of Gehemna's reigning archmage. He has served as an advisor and historian for centuries, but an enduring enchantment prevents him from speaking of two topics: his origins, and The Ten-Eyed Oracle.

actions.name: Legendary Undead
actions.description: Immune to morale checks. Only damaged by magical sources. Hostile spells targeting Mordanticus are DC 18 to cast.

actions.name: Crown of Gehemna
actions.description: 3/day, cause a spell being cast within far to fail.

actions.name: Necrosis
actions.description: DC 15 CON or go to 0 HP. Healing spells are DC 15 to cast on target while at 0 HP due to this effect.

actions.name: Phylactery
actions.description: Cannot be killed while spirit vessel (a diamond) is intact.

actions.name: Absorb (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 13. Near, one target. Target loses the ability to cast one random spell until completing a rest, and Mordanticus regains a lost spell of the same tier or less.

actions.name: Banish (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 14. All extradimensional creatures within near DC 15 CHA or sent back to their home planes.

actions.name: Bind (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 12. One humanoid in far paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Blast (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 14. One creature in near takes 5d8 damage.

actions.name: Phase (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 13. Self. Teleport up to one mile.

actions.name: True Name (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 15. Near. Learn the True Name of target.

name: Mummy
description: A desiccated, linen-wrapped zombie. It was created with an intricate embalming ritual used only upon the most worthy warriors or rulers.

actions.name: Supreme Undead
actions.description: Immune to morale checks. Only damaged by magical sources.

actions.name: Desiccated
actions.description: Can be damaged by fire. Takes x2 damage from it.

actions.name: Necrosis
actions.description: DC 15 CON or drop to 0 HP. Healing spells are DC 15 to cast on target while at 0 HP due to this effect.

name: Mushroomfolk
description: Lumbering humanoids with spongy, elongated bodies and toadstools on their heads.

actions.name: Sunblind
actions.description: Blinded in bright light.

actions.name: Telepathic
actions.description: Speak mentally with creatures within double near.

name: Naga
description: Magic-wielding cobras towering ten feet high. Once a dominant species, they are now rare and reclusive, bitter to the last.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 15 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Agony (CHA Spell)
actions.description: DC 14. One target in near takes 3d8 damage.

actions.name: Hypnotize (CHA Spell)
actions.description: DC 13. Focus. One target in near range who can see naga is helplessly stupefied for duration.

actions.name: Whispers (CHA Spell)
actions.description: DC 12. Hostile spells cast on one target in near are DC 9 for 1d4 rounds.

name: Naga, Bone
description: Mindless, skeletal husks of nagas reanimated by sorcery.

actions.name: Greater Undead
actions.description: Immune to morale checks. Only damaged by silver or magical sources.

name: Nightmare
description: Black warhorses with flaming manes, hooves, and eyes.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Nightmare and its rider immune to fire.

name: Obe-Ixx of Azarumme
description: A pale, angular woman in translucent plate mail fashioned from giant scorpion chitin. Obe-Ixx, daughter of Azarumme, rose up from the prehistoric barbarian tribes of Tal-Yool to conquer all in her path. One day, she stood at the steps of an obsidian ziggurat deep within the trackless jungle. Forty nights later, Obe-Ixx emerged as the ur-vampire, bloodlust made flesh. Her dynasty would rise and fall again and again over the coming millennia.
attack: 4 greatsword (near) +11 (1d12 + 2 + Moonbite properties) and 1 bite + 9 (1d8 + blood drain) and 1 charm

actions.name: Legendary Undead
actions.description: Immune to morale checks. Only damaged by magical sources. Hostile spells targeting Obe-Ixx are DC 18 to cast.

actions.name: Blood Drain
actions.description: Obe-Ixx heals 2d8 HP, target permanently loses 1d6 CON. At 0 CON, target dies and rises as a loyal vampire or vampire spawn (Obe-Ixx chooses).

actions.name: Charm
actions.description: One humanoid target who can see Obe-Ixx within near, DC 15 CHA or under Obe-Ixx's control for 1d4 days.

actions.name: Moonbite Properties
actions.description: +2 greatsword, thrown weapon, returns after being thrown. Spells to heal damage it inflicts are DC 15 to cast.

actions.name: Shapechange
actions.description: In place of attacks, turn into a giant bat, dire wolf, or back into regular form.

actions.name: Ur-Vampire
actions.description: Must sleep in sarcophagus at least once per moon cycle or loses 2d8 HP per day that cannot heal until sleeping in sarcophagus. Takes 3d8 damage each round while in direct sunlight. Cannot be killed unless pierced through heart while at 0 HP with a wooden stake carved from a tree from the Tal-Yool jungle.

name: Ochre Jelly
description: An orange puddle of quivering slime.

actions.name: Split
actions.description: If cut or chopped, split into two smaller oozes (divide remaining HP between both).

name: Octopus, Giant
description: Octopi as large as sailing skiffs.

actions.name: Grab
actions.description: DC 15 STR or immobilized.

actions.name: Tentacle auto-hits each round
actions.description: DC 15 STR on turn to break free.

actions.name: Ink
actions.description: In place of attacks, ink cloud blinds all in near for 1d4 rounds.

name: Ogre
description: A massive, dim-witted brute with tusks and a heavy frame. Often lords over goblins or orcs.

name: Oni
description: Cunning and sorcerous ogre-demons with shaggy white hair, blue skin, and yellow eyes.

actions.name: Shapeshift
actions.description: In place of attacks, turn into any humanoid or back into original form.

actions.name: Fade (CHA Spell)
actions.description: DC 13. Self. Become invisible for 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Hellfrost (CHA Spell)
actions.description: DC 13. All within near-sized cube extending from oni 3d6 damage.

actions.name: Mist (CHA Spell)
actions.description: DC 13. Self. Turn into mist that can fly double near. Lasts 2d4 rounds.

name: Orc
description: A tusked, tall humanoid with gray skin and pointed ears.

actions.name: Rage
actions.description: 1/day, immune to morale checks, +1d4 damage (3 rounds).

name: Orc, Chieftain
description: An imposing orc with scars crisscrossing its body.

actions.name: Rage
actions.description: 1/day, immune to morale checks, +1d4 damage (3 rounds).

name: Otyugh
description: Stumpy, three-legged beasts with barbed tentacles and vast mouths. Drawn by rot and filth.

actions.name: Disease
actions.description: DC 15 CON or infected. DC 15 CON each day or lose 1d6 HP (can't heal). Ends on success.

name: Owlbear
description: Cantankerous bears with owl eyes, beaks, and feathers.

actions.name: Crush
actions.description: Deals an extra die of damage if it hits the same target with both claws.

name: Panther
description: Supple large cats with blue-black fur. Stealthy hunters.

name: Peasant
description: A commoner in worn clothes.

name: Pegasus
description: Winged horses with noble bearings and pearly white coats.

name: Phoenix
description: Huge, soaring eagles made of searing flames. Intelligent and imbued with immortal magic.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Immune to fire.

actions.name: Explosion
actions.description: Upon death, creatures within double near of phoenix DC 18 DEX or 10d6 damage.

actions.name: Heat Aura
actions.description: Creatures within near of phoenix at start of turn DC 15 CON or 2d6 damage.

actions.name: Rebirth
actions.description: A red-hot egg remains after death. Phoenix hatches from it in 1d4 days.

name: Piranha, Swarm
description: A school of flat, silvery fish with vicious fangs.

actions.name: Savage
actions.description: ADV on attacks against creatures below half their HP.

name: Pirate
description: Seafaring scoundrels who live to steal and hoard treasure.

name: Plesiosaurus
description: Aquatic reptiles as big as elephants. Flat flippers and narrow, toothy maws on long necks.

name: Priest
description: A respected member of a clergy who leads holy rituals and rites.

actions.name: Anoint (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 12. Close. One weapon or armor becomes a magic +2 version for 10 rounds.

actions.name: Healing Touch (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 11. Heal one creature within close for 2d4 HP.

actions.name: Holy Flame (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 13. Self. Weapons ignite in magic flames and deal an additional 1d6 damage for 5 rounds.

actions.name: Rebuke (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 13. Focus. Chaotic creatures cannot attack priest or come within near range for duration.

name: Primordial Slime
description: A mass of clear ooze strobing with sick pulses of violet light.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only harmed by fire.

actions.name: Dissolve
actions.description: One random piece of non-magical gear the target carries is destroyed.

name: Pterodactyl
description: Long-beaked beasts with wide, triangular wings. Large enough to carry off a human.

actions.name: Grab
actions.description: DC 15 STR or held. DC 15 STR on turn to break free.

name: Purple Worm
description: A massive worm as tall as a castle keep. Has a rotating maw and is covered in purple chitin.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 15 CON or go to 0 HP.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: On a natural attack roll of 18-20, target is swallowed.

name: Rakshasa
description: Demonic illusionists whose true form is of a humanlike great cat with backwards hands.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources. Immune to hostile spells of 3rd tier or lower.

actions.name: Mesmerism
actions.description: Can read the minds of all creatures within near. Can instantly take on the illusory appearance of any humanoid.

actions.name: Weakness
actions.description: A crossbow bolt under the effects of the holy weapon spell kills the rakshasa.

name: Rat
description: Rangy, plague-carrying rodents that infest underground places.

actions.name: Disease
actions.description: DC 9 CON or 1d4 CON damage (can't heal while ill).

name: Rat, Dire
description: Child-sized, savage rats bristling with bony face and spine ridges.

actions.name: Disease
actions.description: DC 12 CON or 1d4 CON damage (can't heal while ill).

name: Rat, Giant
description: Cunning rats as large as cats. Mangy fur and wormlike tails.

actions.name: Disease
actions.description: DC 12 CON or 1d4 CON damage (can't heal while ill).

name: Rat, Swarm
description: A screeching tidal wave of clawing and biting rats.

actions.name: Disease
actions.description: DC 9 CON or 1d4 CON damage (can't heal while ill).

name: Rathgamnon
description: A pearl-white lion with feathered wings that stands twenty feet tall. Rathgamnon is Madeera the Covenant's mightiest servant; his blank eyes see far into the depths of time and space. He spends all eternity watching the whirl of the stars from the highest mountain in the realm of mortals, waiting for the celestial alignments that prophesy epochs of weal and woe, titanic changes to the balance of power in the cosmos, or threats to the laws of reality itself.

actions.name: Legendary
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources. Hostile spells targeting Rathgamnon are DC 18 to cast.

actions.name: Roar
actions.description: In place of attacks, all creatures who can hear within far DC 18 CHA or be rendered blind and speechless for 1d4 days.

actions.name: Abjure (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 13. Self. End any hostile magical effects affecting Rathgamnon.

actions.name: Abolish (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 13. One target in far takes 5d8 damage.

actions.name: Anchor (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 14. One target in far DC 18 STR or bound and anchored by chains of golden runes for 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Gate (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 14. Open a portal at a point within near to another location on any plane. Lasts 1d6 rounds or until dismissed.

actions.name: Portent (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 14. Lasts 2d4 rounds. One target in near has advantage or disadvantage on all attack rolls and checks.

actions.name: Time Stop (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 15. Self. Time freezes for everyone except Rathgamnon for 1d4 rounds. Everything that occurs during the time freeze happens simultaneously when the spell ends.

name: Reaver
description: A knight in blackened armor riddled with cruel barbs.

actions.name: Bloodlust
actions.description: +2 damage with melee weapons (included).

name: Remorhaz
description: Massive, blue centipedes with neck hoods and red-hot spine spikes. Dwell in arctic climates.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Immune to cold and fire.

actions.name: Melt
actions.description: Non-magical metal objects that touch the remorhaz melt on a d6 roll of 1-3.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: On a natural attack roll of 18-20, target is swallowed.

name: Rhinoceros
description: Gray-skinned bulls with single nose horns. Dwell in grasslands.

actions.name: Charge
actions.description: Move up to double near in straight line and make 1 horn attack. If hit, x3 damage.

name: Rime Walker
description: Human-shaped beings formed from black space ice. Their eyes are two flickering, white lights.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Immune to cold.

actions.name: Ice Aura
actions.description: Enemies within near of rime walker DC 12 CON at start of turn or lose action.

name: Roc
description: Dragon-sized hawks that nest in remote mountains.

actions.name: Grab
actions.description: DC 18 STR or target held. DC 18 STR on turn to break free.

name: Roper
description: Ravenous monstrosities that look like cave rocks when their single eye and maw are closed.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Can only be damaged by magical sources.

actions.name: Grab
actions.description: DC 15 STR or target trapped in tendril. Tendril auto-hits target next round. DC 15 STR on turn to break free.

actions.name: Pull
actions.description: In place of a tendril attack, pull a grabbed target a near distance.

actions.name: Tendrils
actions.description: Four total. AC 18 each. 4+ damage to one severs it.

name: Rot Flower
description: Carnivorous flowers as large as a human. They reek of carrion.

actions.name: Toxin
actions.description: DC 12 CON or unconscious for 1d4 rounds.

name: Rust Monster
description: A mud-brown insect as big as a wolf with two feathery antennae. Consumes metal.

actions.name: Corrosive
actions.description: Metal that touches the rust monster is destroyed on a d6 roll of 1-3.

name: Sahuagin
description: Humanoids with sea-green skin, webbed limbs, and shark teeth. Vicious hunters.

actions.name: Half-Amphibious
actions.description: Must be submerged in water every 4 hours or suffocates.

name: Salamander
description: Fire-colored lizardfolk with long tails. Flame-like frills run down their backs.
attack: 2 flaming spear (close/near) +4 (1d6 + ignites flammables) or 1 iron longbow (far) +2 (1d8)

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Fire immune.

actions.name: Heat Aura
actions.description: Creatures in close DC 12 CON on turn or 1d8 damage.

name: Scarab, Swarm
description: A chittering cloud of iridescent, oval-shaped beetles.

name: Scarecrow
description: Ragged clothes and a painted burlap head stuffed with straw. Possessed by a malicious spirit.

actions.name: Scream
actions.description: Creatures who hear in double near DC 12 CHA or paralyzed for 1d4 rounds.

name: Scorpion
description: Desert-dwelling arachnids with pincers and curved tail stingers.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 9 CON or go to 0 HP.

name: Scorpion, Giant
description: Chitin-plated scorpions as big as camels.

actions.name: Grab
actions.description: DC 12 STR or target held. DC 12 STR on turn to break free.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 12 CON or go to 0 HP.

name: Shadow
description: Flitting, sentient shadows in the vague shape of a human.

actions.name: Drain
actions.description: Target takes 1 STR damage. At 0 STR, target dies and becomes a shadow.

name: Shambling Mound
description: Fetid piles of slimy vegetation animated to life by lightning.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Fire immune.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.description: If a target is hit by both slams in same round, it is pulled into shambling mound's body and suffocates in 2d4 rounds. DC 15 STR on turn to escape.

name: Shark
description: Bloodthirsty apex predators of the sea. Gray, torpedo-like body.

name: Shark, Megalodon
description: Primordial sharks the size of whales. Savage hunters.

actions.name: Fearless
actions.description: Immune to morale checks.

name: Siren
description: Baleful fey with dove wings and iridescent fish scales. Their singing entrances listeners.

actions.name: Song
actions.description: Enemies who can hear within double near DC 15 CHA or paralyzed 1d4 rounds. Immune for 1 day if passed check.

name: Skeleton
description: A bleach-boned skeleton with red pinpoints of light in its eyes.

actions.name: Undead
actions.description: Immune to morale checks.

name: Smilodon
description: Prehistoric tigers with long canine fangs. They hunt in grasslands and ice fields.

name: Snake, Cobra
description: A weaving serpent with a neck hood and lethal venom.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 18 CON or go to 0 HP with a death timer of 1.

name: Snake, Giant
description: An enormous, mottled serpent that can swallow a cow whole.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.description: Contested STR to hold target immobile for one round.

name: Snake, Swarm
description: A roiling wave of snakes darting and flowing across the ground.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 12 CON or go to 0 HP in 1d4 rounds.

name: Soldier
description: An armed footsoldier trained in the ways of battlefield combat.

name: Sphinx
description: A winged, leonine oracle who can see into time and space and often speaks in riddles. Lives in isolated mountains.

actions.name: Roar
actions.description: In place of attacks, all creatures who can hear within far DC 18 CHA or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Gate (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 14. Open a portal at a point within near to another location on any plane. Lasts 1d6 rounds or until dismissed.

actions.name: Omens (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 12. Self. ADV on all actions for 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Riddle (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 12. One target in far DC 15 INT or stupefied 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Time Bend (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 14. One target in near frozen in time for 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Unmake (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 13. One target in far takes 3d8 damage.

name: Spider
description: Silent, web-weaving arachnids with a flesh-dissolving venom.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 9 CON or take 1d4 damage.

name: Spider, Giant
description: Bulbous abdomen and eight, spindly legs. Dwells high in trees or caves and ambushes prey, capturing them to eat later.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 12 CON or paralyzed 1d4 hours.

name: Spider, Swarm
description: A scurrying carpet of spiders.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 12 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Stingbat
description: Darting, orange insect-bat with four wings and needlelike beak.

actions.name: Blood Drain
actions.description: Attach to bitten target; auto-hit the next round. DC 9 STR on turn to remove.

name: Strangler
description: A gray-skinned, gaunt creature with four ropy limbs tipped in sucker-lined claws.

actions.name: Stealthy
actions.description: ADV on DEX checks to sneak and hide.

actions.name: Strangle
actions.description: Deals x2 damage against surprised creatures. THE TEN-EYED ORACLE

name: The Tarrasque
description: A colossal, four-legged reptile with crocodilian jaws, amber scales, and a diamond-hard, spiked carapace. It towers overhead like a mountain, able to swallow entire villages in one gulp. The tarrasque hibernates deep in the earth or at the bottom of the sea for centuries, only awakening long enough to fill its vast belly in an indiscriminate rampage of terror and destruction. There is only one tarrasque, and it is the most dreaded creature to walk the earth.
attack: 4 thrash (near) +13 (3d10 + sever) and 1 bite (near) +13 (5d10 + sever + swallow)

actions.name: Legendary
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources. Hostile spells targeting the tarrasque are DC 18 to cast.

actions.name: Deep Dweller
actions.description: Immune to harm from fire and cold. Amphibious.

actions.name: Permanent Death
actions.description: Cannot be permanently killed unless a wish spell is cast on it while it is at 0 HP.

actions.name: Rampage
actions.description: In place of attacks, move far in a straight line and make one bite attack. On a hit, triple damage.

actions.name: Reflective Carapace
actions.description: Immune to rays, blasts, or bolts of energy. 1:6 chance these are reflected back at their originator.

actions.name: Regeneration
actions.description: Regains 4d10 lost HP at the beginning of its turn.

actions.name: Sever
actions.description: On a natural attack roll of 18+, the attack also severs a random limb. 1d6: 1. Head, 2-4. Arm, 5-6. Leg.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: DC 18 STR or swallowed whole. Total darkness inside and 4d10 damage per round. Tarrasque regurgitates all swallowed if dealt at least 30 damage in one round to the inside of its gullet.

name: The Ten-Eyed Oracle
description: A floating mass of rubbery skin crusted with barnacles. Its ten eyestalks writhe like snakes, and a deep, circular scar mars its central body,linding what was once a large eye above a lipless maw. The Ten-Eyed Oracle stalks the Shadowdark, burbling mad ,prophesies and somehow moving freely between the lightless fathoms of the earth. The keepers of the deep lore suspect The Ten-Eyed Oracle was once a benevolent ally of mankind, but an unknown calamity drove it to insanity and reckless hatred.

actions.name: Legendary
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources. Hostile spells targeting The Ten-Eyed Oracle are DC 18 to cast.

actions.name: Eyestalk Ray
actions.description:
Each ray can shoot once per round and target one creature or an object up to 1,000 pounds (up to four on same target).

1. Charm. DC 15 CHA or become ally for 1d4 rounds.
2. Hold. DC 15 STR or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.
3. Sleep. DC 15 WIS or asleep 1d4 rounds.
4. Polymorph. DC 15 INT or turned into vermin for 1d4 rounds.
5. Cancel. DC 15 DEX or all magical effects on target end.
6. Confusion. DC 15 WIS or attack a random ally within near.
7. Telekinesis. DC 15 STR or hover target up to double near.
8. Disintegrate. DC 15 DEX or 5d8 damage (object destroyed).
9. Petrify. DC 15 CON or petrified.
10. Death. DC 15 CON or drop to 0 HP with a death timer of 1.

name: The Wandering Merchant
description: A cheerful merchant who appears to be a hale, middle-aged human man with a handlebar mustache. He wears a white shirt, breeches, and leather apron, and he hauls a towering backpack bursting at the seams. Few know the merchant's true nature and origins, though some theorize he is an immortal being or a god (they are not entirely incorrect). The Wandering Merchant always has something useful, far-flung, or incredible to sell at a reasonable price, and there's no telling when or where he'll show up next...

actions.name: Legendary
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources. Hostile spells targeting The Wandering Merchant are DC 18 to cast.

actions.name: Amulet of Rahm-Hotep
actions.description: In place of attacks, teleport to a random location in the multiverse.

actions.name: Bottomless Bag
actions.description: Contains 200 gear slots in magical sub-pockets.

actions.name: Weighs as much as a normal backpack
actions.description: The Wandering Merchant can summon it to himself from anywhere by snapping his fingers.

actions.name: Dice of Truth
actions.description: A set of three six-sided dice whose rolls cannot be magically or mundanely altered in any way.

actions.name: Lop
actions.description: On a natural attack roll of 18-20, behead the target.

actions.name: Reckoning
actions.description: Any creature who steals from The Wandering Merchant develops a curse. Over the next 2d8 days, that creature turns into a cockatrice. This curse can only be lifted by a wish spell or by returning the stolen goods.

actions.name: Strange Lands
actions.description: The Wandering Merchant does not suffer any ill effects from the natural environment he does not wish to suffer.

name: Thief
description: A cat burglar in a black cloak.

actions.name: Stealthy
actions.description: ADV on DEX checks to sneak and hide.

actions.name: Backstab
actions.description: Deal x2 damage against surprised creatures.

name: Thug
description: A bruised and boorish ruffian.

name: Treant
description: Peaceful, slow-moving trees with merry eyes and tremulous voices. They protect the forest.

actions.name: Animate Tree
actions.description: 2/day. In place of attacks, one tree within near awakens as a treant ally without this ability. Reverts back in 1 day.

name: Triceratops
description: Plodding herbivores with a wide, bony skull frill and three horns.

actions.name: Charge
actions.description: Move up to double near in straight line and make 1 horn attack. If hit, x3 damage.

name: Troll

actions.name: Regenerate
actions.description: Regains 2d6 HP on its turn unless its wounds are cauterized with fire or acid.

name: Troll, Frost
description: Rime-covered trolls with blue skin and flinty, black eyes. They stalk arctic lands and frozen boreal forests.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Cold and fire immune.

actions.name: Regenerate
actions.description: Regains 2d6 HP on its turn unless its wounds are cauterized with acid.

name: Tyrannosaurus
description: Towering, bipedal lizards with a massive head, jaws, and neck.

name: Unicorn

actions.name: Healing Horn
actions.description: A touch heals 2d6 HP or ends one curse or disease.

name: Vampire
description: Pale, blood-drinking undead of supreme power and wickedness. They loathe sunlight and protect their coffins at all costs.

actions.name: Supreme Undead
actions.description: Immune to morale checks. Only damaged by magical sources.

actions.name: Blood Drain
actions.description: Vampire heals 2d6 HP and target permanently loses 1d4 CON. At 0 CON, target dies and rises as vampire or vampire spawn (vampire chooses).

actions.name: Charm
actions.description: One humanoid target who can see vampire within near, DC 15 CHA or under vampire's control for 1d4 days.

actions.name: Shapechange
actions.description: In place of attacks, turn into a bat, wolf, or back into regular form.

actions.name: Vampire
actions.description: Must sleep in a coffin daily or loses 2d6 HP each day that can't be healed until resting in coffin. Takes 3d8 damage each round while in direct sunlight. Cannot be killed unless pierced through heart with a wooden stake while at 0 HP.

name: Vampire Spawn
description: Lesser, feral vampires born from the bite of their vampiric sires. Bloodthirsty and savage. They rarely leave a victim alive.

actions.name: Greater Undead
actions.description: Immune to morale checks. Only damaged by silver or magical sources.

actions.name: Blood Drain
actions.description: Vampire heals 2d6 HP and target permanently loses 1d4 CON. At 0 CON, target dies and rises as a vampire spawn.

actions.name: Vampire
actions.description: Must sleep in a coffin daily or loses 2d6 HP each day that can't be healed until resting in coffin. Takes 3d8 damage each round while in direct sunlight. Cannot be killed unless pierced through heart with a wooden stake while at 0 HP.

name: Velociraptor
description: Fast, turkey-sized raptors with vicious toe claws. Pack hunters.

actions.name: Clever
actions.description: +1d4 damage when attacking with surprise.

name: Violet Fungus
description: Child-sized, creeping fungi with neon purple caps. Their whiplike roots decompose living flesh.

name: Viperian

name: Viperian, Ophid

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Can only be harmed by magical sources.

name: Viperian, Wizard
description: Thin viperians with scales tinged in black. They wear silk robes and silver, serpentine jewelry.

actions.name: Hiss (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 12. End one spell within far.

actions.name: Summon Cobra (INT Spell)

actions.name: Venom (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 12. One target in far takes 2d8 damage.

actions.name: Whispers (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 14. Focus. All enemies within near of viperian wizard have DISADV on spellcasting checks for the duration.

name: Void Spawn
description: Scythe-like limbs jut from a purple bulb as big as an ogre. Its lower half is a nest of tentacles.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Immune to cold.

actions.name: Toxin
actions.description: DC 12 CON or paralyzed for 1d4 rounds.

name: Void Spider
description: Pale, horse-sized arachnids that become ghostly and intangible.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Immune to cold.

actions.name: Phase
actions.description: Once per round, become corporeal or incorporeal.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 12 CON or drop to 0 HP in 1d4 rounds.

name: Vulture
description: Scavenger birds with black feathers, hunched backs, and bald heads.

actions.name: Carrion Tracker

actions.name: Venom

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by silver or magic sources.

name: Werewolf

actions.name: Impervious

actions.description: Immune to morale checks. Only damaged by silver or magical sources.

actions.name: Life Drain

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.description: 1d4 CON damage. Death if reduced to 0 CON.

name: Wolf

actions.name: Pack Hunter
actions.description: Deals +1 damage while an ally is close.

name: Wolf, Dire
description: A massive wolf with spines of black bone along its brow ridge and back.

actions.name: Pack Hunter
actions.description: Deals +1 damage while an ally is close.

actions.name: Impervious

actions.name: Greater Undead

actions.description: In place of attacks, become corporeal or incorporeal.

actions.description: 1d4 CON damage. Death if reduced to 0 CON.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 15 CON or take 2d10 damage.

description: Lurching and decomposed undead that hunt in mobs.

actions.description: Immune to morale checks.

actions.description: If zombie reduced to 0 HP by a non-magical source, DC 15 CON to go to 1 HP instead
